data.what_is: Usermost empowers you to connect with your users at the right time, right place, right channel, and on a more personal level. Supercharge your marketing efforts using smart, streamlined tools specifically tailored to you, on a variety of channels.
data.product_description: Usermost is an all-in-one marketing automation solution, empowering businesses to thrive via achieving an automated, personalized, and highly efficient line of communications with their customers. It also is an Omni-channel marketing automation platform that allows you to communicate accurately and correctly with your customers at any scale.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Usermost?
Usermost has everything you would need for marketing to your audience and driving brand loyalty. It reaches your audience through various mediums like email, push notifications, SMS etc and allows you to personalize your campaigns and track progress in real time.

What do you dislike about Usermost?
There was nothing I disliked. Their team is pretty responsive and we did not come across any major issues with the software. The trial also helps getting an understanding of the software.

What problems is Usermost solving and how is that benefiting you?
Usermost helps automate, personalize and track campaign progress very easily. With a number of different touchpoints, it is easy to meet your audience where they are and see results quickly.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best way to engage your audience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Usermost?
Our Marketing Team enjoyed monitoring traction on automated CRM campaigns and engaging with our audience as they looked at the products we sold. We would receive live notifications that end users were reviewing our catalog. We were aware when the user was saving items to the profiles of their favorite and added things to their cart, allowing our Team to edit our campaign and send push notifications while there was a hot lead. Our conversion rate skyrocketed. The UI was easy to use.

What do you dislike about Usermost?
We had an issue using SMS push notifications in the first few months. Once they fixed the issue we were experiencing, we had nothing wrong to say. The only downfall or thing I dislike is not using it anymore, being I am no longer in Marketing and Advertising.

What problems is Usermost solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helped reduce spam penetration and organized and cleaned up our data files. We contributed to our customers' happiness by creating targeted campaigns to fit their lifestyle needs.
